Class ResponseCustomException

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Spring.CustomException.ResponseCustomException
  • @ControllerAdvice
public class ResponseCustomException
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    sunil016, Custom Exception handler class, that makes custom response body for the user based on what exception is thrown from the business logic.
